      • vs_circle

        public static Vertical vs_circle​(Vect3 s,
                                 Vect3 vo,
                                 Vect3 vi,
                                 int eps,
                                 double D,
                                 double H)
        Solve the following equation on vz: sz+t*vz = eps*H, where t = Theta_D(s,v,eps). eps determines the bottom, i.e.,-1, or top, i.e., 1, circle.
